events.title: RAPID + TCT 2026
events.desc: North America's largest additive manufacturing event. Boston Convention Center. Academic discounts.
events.pickNote: Additive manufacturing + aerospace defense. Ask about academic discount

events.title: AeroDef Manufacturing (co-located w/ RAPID)
events.desc: Aerospace & defense manufacturing. AI, digital twins, autonomy, supply chain. Boston Convention Center.
events.pickNote: Autonomy, AI, digital twins — directly relevant to your career path

events.title: National Drone Safety Day
events.desc: FAA-sponsored: fly-ins, STEM demos, pilot training. Events nationwide.
events.pickNote: You have your Part 107. Show up, fly, network with commercial operators

events.title: AUVSI XPONENTIAL 2026
events.desc: World's largest unmanned systems conference. 8,500+ experts. Startup pavilion. Detroit, MI.
events.pickNote: World's largest unmanned systems conf. Worth the Detroit trip

events.title: DroneArt Show Boston
events.desc: Candlelit concert + synchronized drone show. Ohiri Field, 95 N Harvard St.

events.title: Robotics Summit & Expo — Day 1
events.desc: 6,000+ devs. 50+ sessions, 250+ exhibitors, live demos, RBR50 Awards. Boston Convention Center.
events.pickNote: THE MUST-ATTEND. Block these dates NOW. Email for academic discount

events.title: Robotics Summit & Expo — Day 2
events.desc: Women in Robotics Breakfast 8am. Keynotes, career fair, networking. Boston Convention Center.
events.pickNote: Career fair + continued expo. Don't skip day 2

events.title: Automate 2026
events.desc: Premier robotics + automation + smart manufacturing show. Chicago, IL.

events.title: Commercial UAV Expo
events.desc: Leading international commercial UAS trade show. Las Vegas.

events.title: BioProcess International
events.desc: 3,200+ scientists. Biopharmaceutical manufacturing. Hynes Convention Center, Boston.

events.title: Tough Tech Summit 2026
events.desc: Deep tech founders, investors. Robotics, energy, hard science. Hotel Commonwealth, Boston.
events.pickNote: Deep tech founders and investors. The Engine was spun out of MIT
